intro: Folotsia, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments and prefers well-draining soil. Folotsia species are popular as houseplants due to their ability to thrive indoors with proper care. Its flowers come in a variety of colors, including purple, blue, and white, making it a favorite among gardeners.
